website_summaries.verdict: While not the best choice for severe or persistent nasal allergies, it's worth a try if you don't want to use a spray with steroids.
pros: Uses cromolyn sodium to strengthen cells in your nasal passages to reduce irritants and the release of histamines
Has earned praise for making ears feel less stuffy
Comes at a reasonably price point for a 200-spray bottle
cons: Doesn't work for everyone, and some users complain that it caused their eyes to feel dry
Doesn't deliver immediate results, as it should be used at least a week before exposure to allergens

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe I can't find it in retail stores.
customer_reviews.text: You must use it 4x day and yes, when allergies are severe and this alone or Claritin alone does not work, I combine the two. But it's so much better than flonase or other steroid sprays! And no, there is no "rebound" effect like affrin. The only problem I see is 4x a day issue - day to forget.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Terlyga

customer_reviews.title: This stuff WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered with allergies for years. I live in Florida and am very sensitive to mold. I have been on antihistamines my whole life practically. I decided to try this product to see if it would help. This stuff WORKS!!! It stops the mast cells from releasing the histamine; therefore eliminates the need for the antihistamines!! Bottom line... no more running itchy nose, no more post nasal drip... This product is a life saver!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett M

customer_reviews.title: A must for allergy season
customer_reviews.text: My son's allergist suggested we use NasalCrom before going outside during allergy season and again when we come back inside. Finally, I can enjoy spring. I can now even visit people who have cats. I use NasalCrom just before I go inside a cat-owner's home, every 2 hours while I'm there and then when I leave. it allows me to breathe, stops the dreadful cough I get around cats, and stops it feeling like I have an elephant on my chest. I use ketotifen eye drops to stop my eyes from itching around pollen and cats
customer_reviews.author: SAinVATop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work, made me miserable!
customer_reviews.text: Clearly given the reviews this stuff must work for some people. It made my nose run so bad it was like a river. Used a box of tissue in a day and my eyes watered so bad I could barely see. My problem was congestion so I figured I would give this a shot. All it did was make me miserable and now I have a very red and sore nose. Again, clearly works for a lot of people just not me. And yes I did use as directed. If anything on the lower side of the dosage. I can only imagine what would have happened if I used it as much as they say you can.
customer_reviews.author: Big Chill

customer_reviews.title: I recommend giving it a try
customer_reviews.text: As a lifelong allergy sufferer, I've tried many products over the years. I've narrowed them down to a few favorites. I use generic Claritin daily, Alaway eye drops as needed, and Nasalcrom as needed. I recently used a generic version of Flonase (I didn't have Nasalcrom on hand and thought I'd give it a try based on commercials I had seen). It seemed to help somewhat. HOWEVER...I think it damaged my sense of smell. I didn't use it for very long but I noticed a difference. After I googled it, that seems to be a known side effect! Nasalcrom doesn't appear to give me any side effects (based on occasional use for several years). I recommend giving it a try!
customer_reviews.author: GH27

customer_reviews.title: Safe drug
customer_reviews.text: Cromolyn is a very safe drug used across the general human population compared to some of the competing nasal allergy products, specifically those molecules containing halogenated steroids, e.g., Triamcinolone. (In case you don't understand my comment, I work in medicine and am specifically aware of variation in genes that detoxify medications and variation for genes for immune response which can be trigger into autoimmune reactions by some chemicals and their metabolites. Metabolites are the intermediate chemical compounds created as your products as your body breaks down a chemical through a long series of chemical reactions.)
customer_reviews.author: B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Try this product for persistent allergies without the side effects of steroid sprays or antihistamines
customer_reviews.text: I used Cromolyn Sodium (Aarane/Intal spinhalers) as a child in the mid-1970's for asthma, and it worked like magic to prevent attacks. When my wife asked for something to control nasal allergies without the potential side effects of corticosteroids (drying, bleeding, irritation), I described to her my experience with Cromolyn. We bought a bottle of NasalCrom for her to try, and her nasal allergies are much, much better!
customer_reviews.author: Robbo

customer_reviews.title: Ck Shelf Life, Lay Your Head Back After Using
customer_reviews.text: Received old stock, expiration date listed gives only a 6 month shelf life. Shame on you Amazon.com. Took off some stars due to this issue. Anyhow been using this product for seasonal allergies off and on the past 7yrs. The secret to using Nasalcrom is to give each nostril 2 sprays each and the lay on your back with your head tilted back slightly for about 10min (as I'm doing while I write this review). This allow Nasalcrom to seep deep into your nasal cavities where it does its job the best.
customer_reviews.author: Joe_Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work - can’t return
customer_reviews.text: Honestly It doesn’t work for me. I have been using it 4 times a day or even more as required and suggested... I’m literally just dying of my allergies and seeing no help from this spray. I notice not the slight bit of change other than having worse days and average days depending how the weather is etc. This item is not eligible for returns or refunds so that is something to consider if you want to try this. You might just be wasting your money like me
customer_reviews.author: Bronwyn

customer_reviews.title: No Stetoids Is Better
customer_reviews.text: My favorite! I like it has no steroids which can be bad for your eyes and promote cataracts. I use this daily during high pollen count times, while lawnmowing or hiking, brush cutting. Very little irritation. I use a saline spray first and blow my nose before using this.
customer_reviews.author: GailR

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to found any nasal spray for allergies that does anything for me. Until now. I don't love the fact that I have to take it so frequently (every few hours), but I'm glad that it at least does something. I can't say that my nose is completely clear, but it's much better. The packaging says it gets better after a couple of weeks, so I'm hoping it continues to help more and more. I'd say it's worth a shot if you're thinking about it!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Kile

customer_reviews.title: NONSTEROIDAL Nasal Spray.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great nasal spray my allergist prescribed way back in 1992. I still use it as I have severe envirinmental allergies. My family has also started using it for seasonal allergies. It seems to be impossible to find in stores, so we rely on Amazon for our source. It is not addictive, nonsteroidal, and is gentle to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for allergy season! Whenever my ears get stuffed up it helps clear them after a few doses. Very effective for when I am exposed to mold. Best of all there are no side effects and no horrible drugs or chemicals involved!
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Makes My Nose Bleed
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed as this product comes highly recommend through Peoples' Pharmacy and reviews; Several times I have tried using it and within the first few uses, I get somewhat severe bleeding, so that's the end of using NasalCrom for me. Glad others have had success.
customer_reviews.author: YankeeinSC

customer_reviews.title: Less may be more...
customer_reviews.text: I find using as directed introduces irritation. Use sparingly until effective. I find it effective with only one spray per day, but still find relief. If you find irritation from use, try backing off the dosage. It worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Best saline spray ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is a staple in my home as the seasons of allergies can be year round. When using this product one knows that it is attacking bacteria in addition to moisturizing the linings of the nose. I recommend using it at least 3 times a day if you are having a nasal allergy problem. Otherwise once a day is enough. If your nose will not stop 'running' I recommend goldenseal in addition to this product, but check with your doctor about the use of goldenseal.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Saw no difference
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for over a month for my allergies, along with a corticosteroid (Flonase/fluticasone), but I’ve seen no difference. I have post-nasal drip constantly and figured this might help a bit more. No effects, and an actual decrease in the efficacy of my fluticasone for the first couple weeks. It’s been well over a month now and I’m still not seeing any difference. I was told this was a mast cell stabilizer, but it certainly hasn’t worked at all for me. I’ll just keep with my other oral allergy meds and the fluticasone.
customer_reviews.author: Ariss McKalynn

customer_reviews.title: Great spray, good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great nasal spray recommended by my doctor for MCAD, it doesn't have any smell which is great for my allergies. The price was good and the expiration date was far enough away
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Caused whole body to itch
customer_reviews.text: After a few days of using this my whole body became itchy and it also caused insomnia. Amazon does not accept returns for this product even though I bought 2 and one is unopened.
customer_reviews.author: Graceful240

customer_reviews.title: Great Product !!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Nasalcrom for over 10 years and it literally changed my life. I knew of no one who had symptoms as bad as I did every Spring and Fall. I have turned several people on to this product. Keep in mind, it does not work immediately like a nasal spray. It takes about two weeks before it works. It prevents (or at the very least, lessens) the symptoms caused by your body's response to allergens. It really, really works and I highly recommend and endorse it.
customer_reviews.author: Woody Williams

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I have severe allergies, worse in the spring, with all of the pollen, I tried this, no relief, I tried Flonase, no relief, tried Allegra, no relief....I'm using Assured severe congestion nasal relief spray, it's the cheapest, and I've been using it for about the last 3 years. I've had this problem since I was a teenager on a dairy farm and I'm now 73yrs old, so this is not a new issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: judyreese

customer_reviews.title: Better method for allergies than other OTC remedies!
customer_reviews.text: If OTC remedies for seasonal allergies leave you drowsy or spacey, this nasal spray is for you. It's certainly not as convenient, but you will likely not have any side effects, and if you use it as described it will reduce your allergy symptoms. I'm glad I purchased this spray this spring as I am not able to use Zrytec/Claritin/Benedryl and I was able to continue gardening in the yard while using the NasalCrom.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Malley

customer_reviews.title: Not for allergies and asthma
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from asthma and allergies and decided to try this for a week instead of my prescription steroid based nasal spray. It did not work. It burned my nose after each use and I got really congested in my nose after using this for a few days. I’m back on my prescription nasal spray now but my nose is still recovering from this. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: vgpepper

customer_reviews.title: Quick relief from nasal allergies
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few products that actually works for my constantly congested nose. I use one spray in each nostril and it almost instantly calms down the inflammation and opens my nasal passages. The only downside is that it doesn't last forever. After a few hours the effect has worn off and I need to use the product again.... but that really is to be expected. I will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Paula S

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT - NO DRUGGY FEELING - A PREVENTATIVE.
customer_reviews.text: With the help of NasalCrom I have completely brought my nasal allergies under control. I used to be miserable all spring and summer but a pharmacist recommended it and I was amazed. I'd like to give NasalCrom way more than 5 stars! 10 or 11! Start sometime before the allergy season - follow the instructions and WOW! You'll be smelling the roses. Ha!
customer_reviews.author: JSR1952

customer_reviews.title: This stuff actuall works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really seems to work well if you use it consistently. Also, really isn't "addictive" like the steroid sprays. It has tremendously improved my post-nasal drip during allergy season--so much that I just use it year-round now. Use once in the morning, and again at night if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Still the best thing for allergies.
customer_reviews.text: This is a mast cell stabilizer. Which prevents allergies. Which works a lot better than taking antihistamines after you're sneezing. And has less side effects than steroids.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Brown

customer_reviews.title: Finally Relief
customer_reviews.text: Nasal Crom has helped my post nasal drip and allergies tremendously. I do have to use it a few times a day. It has worked better than anything I have tried so far including steroid sprays and allergy prescriptions. It is just so great to get some relief.
customer_reviews.author: Nance

customer_reviews.title: Effective nasal spray for allergy sufferers.
customer_reviews.text: I have used NasalCrom for several years as I have problems with hay fever. I can't use a steroid inhaler due to a problem with the retina in my right eye. I was advised however, by an ear/nose/throat specialist several years ago to double up on the dosage, and I certainly found this more effective than using the dosage recommended on the package.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using nasal crom for many years. It works! Takes down swelling in my sinuses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking NasalCrom 4 times a day for about a month. A couple of years ago, I took another nasal allergy product. I quit taking it because I was concerned over the possible side effects after talking to my doctor. I am able to take NasalCrom and it is working for me. My husband and I ride ATV's in the mountains and my allergies flared up. I am now able to ride through the forests with all the pollen producing trees, weeds, etc. Really is working well for me. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is an allergy nasal spray. It does not contain steroids like most over the counter sprays. The sprayer works well and there is NO after taste from the spray. It does work well to coat the nose and keep put pollens. It can be used for an extended period of time. I did not have any headaches or nose bleeds using this product. This is a really good product that works.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: NOT addictive, it does not create rebound effect like some other nasal sprays, doesn't dry you out, just blocks the receptors.
customer_reviews.text: For me, this stuff just plain works! Once in the morning, and once in the evening. And trying to find a reliable brick and mortar source is difficult and costs more when you do find it, so I buy it here, always dependable, always a good price. Obtw.....just the usual allergies, the daily dust and dander of a small family farm operation.
customer_reviews.author: lilmonster

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a horrible allergy season. This stuff is amazing!! I take antihistamines, decongestants, and two nasal sprays. Since starting nasalcrom I feel so much better. I only use my other nose sprays when I'm having a bad day. You need to give it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Finally found this spray...can't find in stores
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for this for some time as I can't find it in the stores. Works great for my allergies. I do take two other oral meds for allergies and Asthma and this helps tons.
customer_reviews.author: cat lady

customer_reviews.title: Great for preventing seasonal allergies.
customer_reviews.text: It is an excellent preventative product to keep seasonal allergies at bay. Before I started using this I would have 2 or 3 sinus infections per season. Now, none! It does take about 2 weeks to be effective, so I always start before my season. Been using it for over 10 years, One year I forgot to start it early enough and got sick.
customer_reviews.author: Earle

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Although I ordered this product several weeks ago, I just started using it within this past week.. With spring around the corner I want to take precautions to avoid allergy attacks and sinus infections. It's easy to use and hasn't presented any problems for me so that's a plus. So many people have had success with it and I'm hoping this will be the answer for me.
customer_reviews.author: LAD Toms River

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as the commercial products without the steroids
customer_reviews.text: This product works as well as, if not better, than the over- the-counter products for sale at pharmacies. However, this product has no steroids. An important feature for people with certain health requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnidaze

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for those with bad kidneys and a bad prostate!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for people with kidney and prostate problems! The only thing on the market that has no side effects on stage 4 kidney disease or a really bad prostate. Seriously great stuff, this is all my dad is able to take with his full blown sinus infection (plus antibiotics of course).
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: This is the only nasal decongestant recommended for pregnant women
customer_reviews.text: This is the only nasal decongestant recommended for pregnant women. If you aren't pregnant and mix it with a steroid, you get even more relief. Unfortunately, it takes a couple of months to see the benefit!
customer_reviews.author: barbara10

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been "addicted" to traditional nasal sprays (ie Afrin-type) for years. I wanted to get away from that but still unstuff my nose, without risks that the traditional spray may cause. Worked immediately and I love it. No scent, no "burn", unstuffs my nose and lasts. I use it 2x a day and results are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Yes. This stuff works
customer_reviews.text: Long time allergy suffer - whole family too. Seasonal allergies, grass in spring, trees in fall, mold. This stuff starts to work pretty quickly, a day or two. A few days later good relief. No burning, bad taste, etc. Done with flounase and those products - this is just as good if not better. Whole family approval. ( we do still take a clartin or zyrtec but know it wouldn't work with out nasalcrom ).
customer_reviews.author: heath

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I used to be stuffy all the time, and had almost constant sinus infections. This has made all that a thing of the past! I love being able to breath! It did take about 2 weeks to be fully clear, but it was worth being patient.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Allergy control with no side effects
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this on and off for several years and it definitely helps control my allergies. I'll still take half a Claritin when needed, but without the NasalCrom, even a Claritin a day was not controlling my allergies. NasalCrom is not an quick fix like decongestants and anti-histamines, it takes a couple of days before you start seeing improvements. But there are no side effects (for me at least) and no bounce back like you can get from other products. I've tried the steroid sprays that my doctor prefers, but when I use them regularly I seem to catch colds much more often. My only complaint about NasalCrom is that it is becoming harder to find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Dave L.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid unless everything else does not work.
customer_reviews.text: This caused such strange feelings in my nose. Read about Cromoglicic acid before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works better than prescription antiallergy spray!
customer_reviews.text: This stops my nose from running!! It's incredible. The dr said this wasnt strong enough and gave a prescription spray. There were LOTS of side effects from that and it didnt work any better!! This one has not given me ANY side effects, and I feel it working immediately!!! I highly recommend this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Saffire Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Leaking bottle
customer_reviews.text: Great for allergies. Stops then before they start Packaging is usually ok but this time it was smashed and box and flyer was wet. Can tell how much liquid was lost. I’m assuming it was not contaminated
customer_reviews.author: charily

customer_reviews.title: Drastically reduces my allergic symptoms. Unlike the various kinds ...
customer_reviews.text: Drastically reduces my allergic symptoms. Unlike the various kinds of steroid sprays, it doesn't give me reflux, a burning sensation in the back of my throat, or the other nasty side effects that caused me to stop using those almost as soon as I started.
customer_reviews.author: L. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Best nasal allergy spray
customer_reviews.text: I love NasalCrom! I've been using it for over 20 years. It can take awhile to work but I have year-round allergies and use it daily. It prevents the need for decongestant for me. I also take a small pile of Rx med's daily and don't worry about interactions with NasalCrom. I must keep the allergies in check, so I also use loratadine daily.
customer_reviews.author: AntiDonna

customer_reviews.title: Allergy Relief
customer_reviews.text: I'm allergic to almost everything and I'm an outdoor person. My allergist has me using a perscription tablet, eye drops and steroid nasal spray. But sometimes all that isn't enough so I add this spray to my daily routine. It has no side effects and doesn't interact with the perscriptions. And it works! No bronchitis, pneumonia or laringytis!
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine Elizabeth Jones

customer_reviews.title: So much better than Flonase or Afrin
customer_reviews.text: Great for allergies, keeps my nasal passages clear without the three day limitation of decongestants. Few side effects. I'll NEVER put steroids up my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Medieval lady

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that works for me
customer_reviews.text: NasalCrom blocks the absorption of dust or pollen that causes allergies. Prescription medications haven't helped my allergies much, nasal rinse products haven't helped a lot--but NasalCrom is different. It works better than anything I've tried. I learned about it years ago when our son would sneeze every few minutes while on the golf course. NasalCrom worked to clear his grass pollen allergy & it never came back. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kay S.

customer_reviews.title: Helps with MCSD
customer_reviews.text: My son uses it for MCSD and it helps to make him less sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for nasal allergies
customer_reviews.text: This is not a steroid or an antihistamine or a vasoconstrictor and therefore avoids all of the unwanted and sometimes dangerous side effects to those classes of drugs. This allergy medication has been around for a number of years and used to be available by prescription only.
customer_reviews.author: film lover 60

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!!! Really works & fast!!!
customer_reviews.text: I only used this a few days before a I noticed a lot less trouble with hayfever symptoms and after a couple of weeks I had none. I recommend this product to anyone I hear complaining about allergies. I found it because of Dr. Andrew Weil's recommendation and I didn't want to take drugs. It doesn't just cover up the symptoms, it helps stop the process that makes the symptoms appear in the first place. Plus it's all natural. Can't beat it for allergies, and not just hayfever from what I've read about it. If you want real relief, try this product!
customer_reviews.author: Teri L. Lunn

customer_reviews.title: I have used NasalCrom twice a day for many years ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used NasalCrom twice a day for many years. It works perfectly for me to combat nasal congestion due to various allergies. I can breathe again! It does not make me drowsy, nervous, etc. because it does not contain antihistamines and it does not inter-act with other medications. When first starting to use NasalCrom, allow several days for the effect to kick in. Then continue to use it regularly as needed.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: best allergy medicine I've tried
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great because I have no side effects, and it nearly eliminates my nasal allergies. I can breath much more easily than without it, and it is the only allergy medicine I know of that works without causing side effects. I am allergic to ragweed, pigweed, and various indoor allergens, and cromolyn sodium (the active ingredient) nasal spray helps all of these. I have not found a significant price difference between this and the generic version so I buy this. It takes about a week to develop full efficacy. Your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Chad A. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Disliked the feeling.
customer_reviews.text: No I did not like this product . It felt like it was burning the inside of my nose.
customer_reviews.author: budswifedml

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to steroid sprays, but you have to use it a lot.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. If you have bad allergies, however, you have to use a it a lot- like 5 to 7 times a day. I use it every day year round, and it keep my nose totally clear. There are zero side effects. I love this stuff because I have a bad reaction to the steroid nasal sprays. Also, you have to use this stuff consistently for a couple of weeks to get the full benefit, just like the steroid sprays.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny B Goode

customer_reviews.title: It comes expired & Amazon won't let you return it.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon.com sells it. Got 200 sprays on 5/17/20. Expires 10/20. When tried to return it, it says ineligible for return though today is 5/22. Amazon won't answer phone and states so in message. Their app, the only means to communicate with them, isn't compatible with my phone. If you like getting screwed, this one's for you. Thought "sold by Amazon" themselves meant something but realized can't get through to them so, evidently, it's useless.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Heyward

customer_reviews.title: NasalCrom is Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've been using NasalCrom for years, and wouldn't use anything else for sinus or nasal congestion. It's formulated so that you actually use much less of it than with other brands I've used. I only need it once in a while, and it always clears my nasal passages so that I can actually breathe -- unlike many other brands. I was frustrated when I could no longer find it in any store locally [Central California, no surprise there], and relieved and thankful when I found it on Amazon.com. Amazon is a god-send for those of us living in small towns with reduced resources. I have NasalCrom on a Subscribe & Save setup.
customer_reviews.author: K. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: One product does not work for all
customer_reviews.text: As much as I wanted it to, NasalCrom did not work for me. After my second sinus infection my doctor asked me to stop using it. I was disappointed but then, one product is not meant for all. I’m truly sorry it has not worked.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen coleman

customer_reviews.title: Helped after a week
customer_reviews.text: These drops really helped me get through the day of looking at my computer for 8+ hours. I wear soft lenses and they don’t hurt at the end of the day thanks to these drops. It took about a week to notice a difference but after that I felt much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jcart

customer_reviews.title: Really works with no steroids
customer_reviews.text: I use NasalCrom every Spring and Summer and it keeps my nasal symptoms in control. I use it 2 times a day instead of the recommended 3-4 times a day. There are no long term side effects like there are with steroid nasal sprays.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie M. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Relief from NasalCrom
customer_reviews.text: NasalCrom works when no other allergy medicine helps me. I always have nasal congestion, not a runny nose like most allergy medicines dry up. NasalCrom took a while of every day use before I noticed a huge relief but once it has built up in your system it works great. It's so nice to be able to breathe through my nose again.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Slotty

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: My allergies are pretty bad. I take an antihistamine daily year-round. In the spring and summer I add a nose spray. I've had good luck with the different ones, but it seems that this one may start working more quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Janet/ Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best allergy symptom medicine anywhere in the market
customer_reviews.text: I used to suffer every year during Spring pollen season with congestion, hacking cough, and fatigue. It always lead to a sinus infection or bronchitis. I've tried everything. But NasalCrom prevents the symptoms altogether. It's the only thing that actually works to prevent the allergic response and ward off the annual two months of misery. I recommend it to all allergy sufferers.
customer_reviews.author: David Kim

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it for anyone with sinus/allergy problems
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years, that is because it really works. My nose is very sensitive and it is the only one I have tried that does not burn. I highly recommend it for anyone with sinus/allergy problems.
customer_reviews.author: georgiagirl

customer_reviews.title: Use daily, not just when you have an allergy attack.
customer_reviews.text: I can't make it through allergy season without NasalCrom! I use it once a day during fall and spring. I doesn't help with allergy symptoms you already have, but it's a great preventative. Start using it, keep using it, and you will have fewer allergy attacks. Yes, the first few times it might burn your sinuses, but you will build up tolerance for that very soon.
customer_reviews.author: David White

customer_reviews.title: Fights hayfever effectively!
customer_reviews.text: I love NasalCrom. When the pollen counts are high, using it 4 times a day allows me to live without sinus pain. I was taking some form at 24 hours antihistamine, but they don't work as well, and the more powerful ones make me a little drowsy. NasalCrom has no side effects for most people, and my understanding is you can use it forever without much to fear (check with your doctor for details, of course). The price on NasalCrom varies widely. Sometimes it is cheaper at our local big box, sometimes here, sometimes from different sources. Shop around.
customer_reviews.author: Woodworker and Geek

customer_reviews.title: This is not Nasacort
customer_reviews.text: This is a knock off of the very effective Nasacort for allergies. Entirely different product with different ingredients and different application instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Kaypee

customer_reviews.title: Easiest way to purchase during COVID
customer_reviews.text: It's a nasal spray, so I have no idea why "flavor" is a feature to rate. But, as someone who has to take this as both a nasal spray and an oral solution, the spray is far more pleasant than the oral solution lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kidner Bean

customer_reviews.title: Great for allergies!
customer_reviews.text: NasalCrom is great stuff for allergies. It's one of the older medications but it still works. Also good for people with mast cell issues and many people find it helps with symptoms of Interstitial Cystitis for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: HvnSnt

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: If I feel any type of allergy symptoms coming on I instantly spray this in my nose. I have been using it for a long time and I really like it in lieu of taking pills
customer_reviews.author: pinkie723

customer_reviews.title: Works slowly
customer_reviews.text: I have used Nasalcrom for at least 15 Years. Although it is a mild antihistamine, It does not produce the nasal irritation that repeated use of some nasal preparations do
customer_reviews.author: Charles Wray

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: It works great and I like the pump spray top, especially because it comes off so you can really clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Y Di Salvi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: With regular use it will help allergies. I was in the original clinical study on the many years ago. I've used it over the years and from suffering horribly from allergies, I now am almost never bothered by them. There prices were cheaper and I didn't have to search all over to find it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Brown

customer_reviews.title: It stops my running noise
customer_reviews.text: I moved to a new place and somehow start allergic. This helps to stop the sneeze and running noise, with no need to take other medicine.
customer_reviews.author: Can't afford planters

customer_reviews.title: Recommended as non-steroid for allergy
customer_reviews.text: Adult daughter with autoimmune diseases using this at the recommendation from her rheumatologist
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: You need to start a couple weeks before your allergy season. Use it 4 times a day. I have no side effects. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Chicken

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without it!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this many years for my allergies. I even remember having an RX for it. Safe to use and is helpful if you want to use less of your nasal steroid-spray. I works by preventing mast cells from releasing their symptom causing agents.
customer_reviews.author: L.C.-H.

customer_reviews.title: My wife is a nurse and she recommended this to me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve suffered from allergies since I can remember. This is a product that doesn’t relieve your nasal allergy symptoms. It prevents them from causing you any issues. If you have chronic nasal allergy issues this is the product that will make that a thing of the past. My wife is a nurse and she recommended this to me. After about the third day of using the product, all of my sniffles, snorts, and sneezes had ceased. Here is to hoping it does the same for you.
customer_reviews.author: Satisied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Mild to Medium Allergies
customer_reviews.text: This helps with mild to medium allergy symptoms. I have used it every day for years. For severe allergy attacks I still use NasalCrom but in conjunction with other treatments.
customer_reviews.author: T. Belcher

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Appears to have ZERO side effects. Works to block allergies rather than mask symptoms. Seems to help my son with his severe dust mite allergy. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: WorkinMomma

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Works
customer_reviews.text: I have not had problems with Allergies since I started taking this. But you must give it time and you have to use it every day. I spay before bed each night.
customer_reviews.author: CookeT

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for me at all and I ordered quite a few. Giving away those to the person who recommended this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Allergy prevention
customer_reviews.text: This is my new allergy prevention. I live in Centea Texas where allergies are legendary. This has worked for me this season
customer_reviews.author: SuzAnd

customer_reviews.title: Product expiration date not far enough in future
customer_reviews.text: This item received yesterday....expiration date is only Oct.2020 ... there are 200 allergy nose sprays....I might use 50 for remainder of this season .. i been using this product probably for 15-20 years. The expiration dates are always about 2 years out. I am not peremitted to return , so I hope I can be reimbursed cost.... $13.78. Lynden Marin
customer_reviews.author: lynden marin

customer_reviews.title: its useless for ne
customer_reviews.text: didn’t work for me. still suffering from allergies... waste of money for me. I will try and use it 5 times a day like what the other review says and see if it will work. will update my reviews then...
customer_reviews.author: Chedave

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: This spray works for me to help stop my allergic reaction to seasonal changes. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Allergy/Sinus/Infection free since using this product.
customer_reviews.text: used for years, not habit forming,can use multiple times a day, & does not make my nose bleed ever....love it been using for 7+ years. Suffered from allergy/sinus/sinus infections, no problems for the last 7 years while using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Great to stop itch on skin
customer_reviews.text: Amazing - stops itch on skin from reactions to plants, bites, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sumy

customer_reviews.title: Noninvasive medication
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is the least invasive medication for nasal allergies out there. You have to use it about five times a day, so I keep it next to my tooth brush and again am reminded to use it when I brush teeth after a meal. Long-term steroid use contributes to cataracts, long-term antihistamines worsens Alzheimer's. This is safer.
customer_reviews.author: cybercitizen

customer_reviews.title: ...It's actually working...!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have much faith that this would make a difference, but it really has. I'm amazed. I'm allergic to dust mites, and this helps keep me from sneezing. Even the tingle before a sneeze is enough to give me a sinus headache within minutes -- an actual sneeze really causes problems, often leading to migraine auras/migraines -- so finding something to mitigate this has been really beneficial. I take two loratadine tablets a day, which help a little, but this stuff really seems to keep my nasal allergies at bay.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Broke and No Returns
customer_reviews.text: Nasal Crom does help with my allergies but when I received this one, the pump was broken and I can't get even a partial mist to come out:(. They do not do returns and the nasal spray is not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K.

customer_reviews.title: Allergy Medicine
customer_reviews.text: This is a good allergy medication., however I can't find it locally so I'm glad to be able to purchase it thru Amazon
customer_reviews.author: dreaming of the next escape

customer_reviews.title: This is a life saver
customer_reviews.text: I have been using NasalCrom for 27 years and have be allergy symptom free for that entire time. It does not treat the symptoms it blocks the allergens so that you do not have any symptoms. I was diagnosed with an allergy to house dust and house mites and a mild allergy to cats. I have owned Persian cats for the last 20 years with no symptoms. I would recommend this to anyone with a mild nasal allergy.
customer_reviews.author: Don Doerner

customer_reviews.title: Great Allergy Relief
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the product for years for my allergies. I used to buy it from Walmart but their prices went up and Amazon had the best price so I bought from them this time. It is a great product for allergy relief and does not have any really bad side effects.
customer_reviews.author: G. Robinette

customer_reviews.title: ... helps with my post nasal drip which usually gets worse in the evening
customer_reviews.text: NasalCrom helps with my post nasal drip which usually gets worse in the evening. This product gives me relief.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Might as well be Nasacort.
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended this for my congestion/post nasal drip that happens from allergies. I can’t really tell a different between this product and Nasacort. It hasn’t helped my sinus issues that much.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

product_meta.title: NasalCrom Nasal Spray Allergy Symptom Controller | 200 Sprays | .88 FL OZ
product_meta.description: Size:0.88 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Suffer from nasal allergies? We're all about allergy symptom prevention. NasalCrom works differently from other over the counter allergy products and brings relief from chronic allergy symptoms before they begin. When used before exposure to many common allergens, NasalCrom can prevent the onset of nasal allergy attacks and build protection against future symptoms as long as you continue to use it as directed. It contains no steroids and is safe to use with other allergy medications. NasalCrom does not cause drowsiness or jitters, plus it is non habit forming. NasalCrom is safe for kids ages two and up. To enjoy the full preventative power of NasalCrom, it’s important to note that you should start using it a week or two before you expect to encounter problematic allergens. Fortunately, NasalCrom will still provide relief while it builds up full protection against further symptoms.
feature_bullets: Relieves allergy symptoms, including runny/itchy nose, sneezing, allergic stuffy nose
Prevents and controls nasal allergy symptoms from occurring in the first place; 200 Sprays included
No drowsiness or jitters, plus it is non habit forming
No steroids; safe to use with other allergy medications
Safe for kids ages two and up

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
